title: iPhone XS Cases: 7 cases to protect your new investment | Trusted Reviews
description: ![iPhone XScases]()A Max for your Max? As the name implies, the Evo Max is the hardiest ofTech21’s current iPhone XS and XS Max case lineup. Available in black or DeepBlue, the Evo Max features a sliding camera cover to ensure those lenses stayscratch-free, the composite FlexShock design protects from drops up to 14 feetand Tech21 even throws in a holster for good measure.Wireless charging shouldn’t be affected when using this case either.**We’ll be adding to this list once the iPhone XS is available, so bookmarkthis page for more.**
